description: Numbers n where 36n^2+24n+7 is prime (sorted by absolute values with negatives before positives).
comments: 36m^2+24m+7=(6m+2)^2+3 which is three more than a square
crossrefs: This sequence and formula generate all but the first prime of the form k^2+3, i.e. A049423.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 06 2000
